title: Healthy Living Workshops
summary: Interactive sessions on nutrition, exercise, and mental wellbeing.
content: Join our interactive workshops covering nutrition basics, weekly exercise plans, and mindfulness practice. Suitable for all stages of life.

title: Community Wellness Programs
summary: Programs to support physical, emotional and social wellbeing.
content: Tailored community programs including group walks, strength training, and peer support activities.

title: Wellness Workshop Registration
summary: Register for upcoming workshops with practical tips for daily life.
content: Hands-on sessions on sleep hygiene, stress reduction, and meal planning. Registration required.
